```{r setup, include=FALSE}
usePackage <- function(p)
{
  if (!is.element(p, installed.packages()[,1]))
    install.packages(p, repos='http://cran.r-project.org', dep = TRUE)
}
usePackage('flexdashboard')
usePackage('RMongo')
usePackage('RJSONIO')
usePackage('plotly')
usePackage('ggplot2')
usePackage('urltools')
usePackage('DT')
library('flexdashboard')
library('urltools')
library('RMongo')
library('RJSONIO')
library('plotly')
library('ggplot2')
library('DT')
mg1 <- mongoDbConnect(params$dbname)
print(dbShowCollections(mg1))
resultType <- dbGetQueryForKeys(mg1, 'webifierTestResultData',"{}", "{overallResultType:1}",skip=0,limit=Inf)
```

### saubere Webseiten

```{r}
value <- nrow(resultType[resultType$overallResultType=='CLEAN',])
base <- nrow(resultType)
gauge(value, min = 0, max = base, label = paste(round((value/base)*100),"%",sep=""), gaugeSectors(
  success = c(0, base), warning = c(-10, -5), danger = c(-4, -1)
))
```

### Testergebnisverteilung

```{r}
testResults <- dbGetQueryForKeys(mg1, 'webifierSingleTestResultData',"{}", '{_id:0,name:1,result:1}',skip=0,limit=Inf)
testResults <- testResults[,-1]
testResults[testResults$result=='MALICIOUS',2] <- "bedrohlich"
testResults[testResults$result=='SUSPICIOUS',2] <- "verdächtig"
testResults[testResults$result=='CLEAN',2] <- "sauber"
testResults[testResults$result=='UNDEFINED',2] <- "unbekannt"
names(testResults) <- c('Testname','Ergebnis')
p <- ggplot(data = testResults, aes(x = Testname, fill = Ergebnis)) +
            geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
            ylab("Anzahl") + 
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("red","darkgreen","grey","orange"))
ggplotly(p)

```

### Erkennungen anhand Top-Level-Domains

```{r}
result <- dbGetQueryForKeys(mg1, 'webifierTestResultData',"{}", "{host:1,overallResultType:1}",skip=0,limit=Inf)
result[,1] <- tld_extract(result[,1],NULL)[,2]
result <- result[result[,2]!="CLEAN",]
result[result$overallResultType=='MALICIOUS',2] <- "bedrohlich"
result[result$overallResultType=='SUSPICIOUS',2] <- "verdächtig"
result[result$overallResultType=='UNDEFINED',2] <- "unbekannt"
names(result) <- c('TLD','Ergebnis','id')
p <- ggplot(data = result, aes(x = TLD, fill = Ergebnis),col="Anzahl") +
            geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
            ylab("Anzahl") + 
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("red","orange","grey"))
ggplotly(p)

```

### prozentuale Erkennungen anhand Top-Level-Domains

```{r}
result <- dbGetQueryForKeys(mg1, 'webifierTestResultData',"{}", "{host:1,overallResultType:1}",skip=0,limit=Inf)
result[,1] <- tld_extract(result[,1],NULL)[,2]
result <- result[result[,2]!="CLEAN",]
names(result)[3] <- "Anzahl"
agg.result <- aggregate(Anzahl ~ host+overallResultType,result,length)
result[result$overallResultType=='MALICIOUS',2] <- "bedrohlich"
result[result$overallResultType=='SUSPICIOUS',2] <- "verdächtig"
result[result$overallResultType=='UNDEFINED',2] <- "unbekannt"
names(result) <- c('TLD','Ergebnis','Anzahl')
p <- plot_ly(alpha = 0.6) %>%
  add_histogram(x = result$Ergebnis,data= result[result$Ergebnis=='bedrohlich',]) %>%
  add_histogram(x = result$Ergebnis,data= result[result$Ergebnis=='verdächtig',]) %>%
  add_histogram(x = result$Ergebnis,data= result[result$Ergebnis=='unbekannt',]) %>%
  layout(barmode = "stack")
ggplotly(p)

```

### Verteilung der getesteten Top-Level-Domains

```{r}
result <- dbGetQueryForKeys(mg1, 'webifierTestResultData',"{}", "{host:1,overallResultType:1}",skip=0,limit=Inf)
result[,1] <- tld_extract(result[,1],NULL)[,2]
names(result)[1] <- "TLD"
tlds <- result[,-3]
names(tlds)[2] <- "count"
tlds <- aggregate(count ~ TLD,tlds,length)
names(tlds) <- c('TLD','Anzahl')
tld_sum <- sum(tlds$Anzahl)
tlds[(tlds$Anzahl/tld_sum)<0.01,1] <- 'Andere'
p <- plot_ly(tlds, labels = ~TLD, values = ~Anzahl, type = 'pie') %>%
  layout(title = 'Verteilung der getesteten Top-Level-Domains',
         xaxis = list(showgrid = FALSE, zeroline = FALSE, showticklabels = FALSE),
         yaxis = list(showgrid = FALSE, zeroline = FALSE, showticklabels = FALSE))

ggplotly(p)
```

result <- dbGetQueryForKeys(mg1, 'webifierTestResultData',"{}", "{datetime:1,host:1,overallResultType:1}",skip=0,limit=Inf)
result <- result[,-4]
names(result) <- c('Datum','Domain','Ergebnis')
locale <- Sys.setlocale("LC_TIME", "en_US.UTF-8")
format <- "%a %b %d %H:%M:%S CEST %Y"
